SELECT T1.RCP_SN , T1.ENTRP_DV_CD , T2.SV_CNR_SN , T1.PD_NM , T2.SV_CNR_NM , T2.SV_CNR_LOCARA_TNO , T2.SV_CNR_EXNO_ENCR , T2.SV_CNR_IDV_TNO , T2.SV_CNR_ADR , T2.SV_CNR_DTL_ADR , T2.SV_CNR_ICHR_PRTNR_NM FROM TB_SVPD_OUTS_SV_RCP_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_OUTS_SV_CNR_IZ T2 ON T2.SV_CNR_SN = T1.SV_CNR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.ENTRP_DV_CD = '7'
AND T1.PD_NM LIKE '%'||#{cnrNm}||'%' OR T2.SV_CNR_NM LIKE '%'||#{cnrNm}||'%'
AND T1.PD_NM LIKE '%'||#{pdNm}||'%' AND T2.SV_CNR_NM LIKE '%'||#{cnrNm}||'%'

SELECT SV_CNR_SN , SV_CNR_NM , SV_CNR_LOCARA_TNO , SV_CNR_EXNO_ENCR , SV_CNR_IDV_TNO , SV_CNR_ZIP , SV_CNR_ADR , SV_CNR_DTL_ADR , SV_CNR_ICHR_PRTNR_NM FROM TB_SVPD_OUTS_SV_CNR_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY SV_CNR_NM
